short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to download images from URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Image Downloader" Chrome extension allows you to quickly and easily download images from multiple URLs. It provides a simple interface where you can enter the URLs of the images you want to download, and with just a click, the extension fetches the images and saves them to your computer. It's a convenient tool for saving images from various sources without the need for complex manual downloads.
